import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import './Booking.css'; const apiuser = 'http://localhost:9999/user' const apiBooking = "http://localhost:9999/booking" export default class Booking extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.onDate = this.onDate.bind(this) this.onSubmitBooking = this.onSubmitBooking.bind(this) this.state= { startdate : "", enddate : "", typeroom: "" } } onDate(){ const config = { headers: { Authorization : localStorage.getItem('token') } } // api axios นำ email มาแสดง axios.get(apiuser,config) .then( res => { // เซต Email มาแสดง this.setState({ id: res.data[0].id }) console.log("onDate id : ", this.state.id) }, err => { console.log(err) } ) } onSubmitBooking(){ console.log("onSubmitBooking") const configBooking = { headers: { Authorization : localStorage.getItem('token') } } axios.post(apiBooking,configBooking) .then( res => { console.log(res) }, err => { console } ) } render() { return (
this.setState({ create_from: e.target.value })} />
this.setState({ create_to: e.target.value })} />
